description.value:
Forge World Techna-Linguist

Common Lore (Tech) (Int) and Common Lore (Machine Cult) (Int) are untrained Basic Skills for you.

Your upbringing on a forge world has given you an innate understanding of technological matters and the mysteries of the Machine Cult, allowing you to comprehend basic technical and theological concepts without formal training.

system.benefit: Common Lore (Tech) and Common Lore (Machine Cult) are untrained Basic Skills (normally Advanced).
